title: Windows 11 stops growing while Windows 10 21H2 takes the top spot, according to AdDuplex
content:
After rising fairly quickly in its first few months, Windows 11 growth seems to have stalled in March, according to the latest AdDuplex survey. The latest charts show that Windows 11 usage share has remained nearly identical compared to February. However, Windows 10 version 21H2 has seen some growth and it became the most used

The post Windows 11 stops growing while Windows 10 21H2 takes the top spot, according to AdDuplex appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The latest AdDuplex report shws that Windows 11 didn't see much growth in March, and Windows 10 21H2 is now the most used version.
